author: mark-grimes
body: Pull request #6267 contained changes to a config file that were discussed, but hadn't been merged yet.  In the mean time another commit was added that appears unrelated to the original pull request.  This just splits the two topics, so that the approved config file changes can be merged while the new commit can be discussed.
title: Subset of #6267 (Updating TanLorentzAnglePerTesla parameter...)
